Uses of Interface
org.ensembl.variation.datamodel.Variation

Packages that use Variation
org.ensembl.variation.datamodel Data types that are unique to ensembl variation databases such as Variation, Allele and Genotype. 
org.ensembl.variation.driver Driver and adaptors for accessing ensembl variation databases.
